verses.text: Aton in lesal a in Habacuc in, schecab' in Dios.
Mamin Jehová, ayic swab'an yab'ixal masanil tas a b'onac, ste sat in k'ol yuj. B'o icha tas a b'onac t'a peka' chi' t'a ko tiempoal tik. Wach'chom t'a skal yowal a k'ool, ch'ox ok'elk'olal t'ayonh.
Ha Dios Axonhej Ochi, scot t'a lum tzalan Parán t'a yol yic Temán. Smacchajel masanil satcha’anh yuj stziquiquial, haxo masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tz'alan wach' lolonel t'ay.
Sjawi t'a skal stziquiquial. Tz'elta copoljoc k'ak' t'a yol sk'ab', sch'oxanel spoder k'ub'anel yuj.
Ha ilya b'ab'el sb'at yuj, ha t'a spatic tzak'an sb'at chamel.

Ayic tz'och waan, tz'ib'xik'e lum lum tik smasanil. Masanil juntzanh nación slaj ib'xik'e yuj xiwelal ayic tz'och k'elan t'a heb'. Ha juntzanh lum witz aytaxon t'a peka', slaj k'e tamaljoc lu'um, slaj em lanhaljoc lu'um. Yujto a Jehová wan sb'oan icha tas sb'onac t'a peka',
yuj chi' swil yochcan heb' anima cajan t'a chonhab' Cusán t'a ilk'olal. Swilpax yochcan heb' cajan t'a chonhab' Madián t'a xivk'olal.

Mamin Jehová, manhoc t'ha ha' niwac ha' ix cot owal. Manhok pax t'ha ha' mar ix cot yowal a k'ool. Ayic ix ach b'at t'a owal yic tza satel heb' ajk'ool, ichato ix ach k'e t'a yib'anh a chej, mato ach k'e t'a yol a carruaje yic owal.
Ichato ix laj ik'k'eta a jul-lab' t'a yol yet'tal, yic tzach julwaj yet'oc. Ha ha' niwac ha', ix te' k'e ha', ix el ha' t'a smelemal uuj.
Ayic ix a ch'oxan a b'a, ix te ib'xik'e lum niwac witz, ix cot niwac yaxnhab' t'a satcha’anh, ix k'anh sk'e chulnaj ha' mar, ayxo smay ix aj sk'e waan ha' ayic ix a ch'oxan a b'a chi'.
Ix och waan k'u yet' k'een uj ayic copoljub' yel sk'ak'al a jul-lab' yet' a lanza ayic sb'ati.
Yed' yowal a k'ool ix a tek'canem lum lum tik. Yed' pax a k'ak'alk'olal ix a tek'canem juntzanh nación.
Ix ach elta yic tzach kolwaj t'a a chonhab' yet' t'a winh rey sik'b'ilel uuj. Axo winh yajalil heb' anima te chuk, ix a tek'canem winh. Ix a satel schonhab' winh, masanto ix checlaj yich.
Ha heb' yajal yaj t'a skal heb' ajk'ol chi', a yet' syamk'ab' heb' yic owal, a yet'oc ix a milcham heb' ayic ix ja heb' t'ayonh yic tzonh satanel heb' yalani.
Ichato ix ach b'ey t'a yib'anh ha' mar yet' nok' a chej, yuj chi' ix k'e chulnaj ha' mar chi'.

Ayic ix wab'an masanil tas ol jawok t'a quib'anh, ix in xivk'ei. Ix ib'xik'e in ti'. Masanil in niwanil ix el yip, ix el pax yip in xub'. Wach'chom icha chi' ol ajoc, palta niwan ol wutoc in k'ol in tanhwan jun k'ual ayic ol jawok yaelal t'a yib'anh heb' tz'ak'an owal qued'oc.

Tzin te tzalaj wal uuj ach Jehová in Kolumal, wach'chom manh ol xumacan te' higo, manh ol satan te' uwa yet' te' oliwo, manh ol yak' sat tas tz'avchaji, wach'chom ol satel masanil nok' calnel yet' nok' wacax t'a yol macte', palta ol walnhej wach' lolonel t'ayach.

Mamin Jehová, a ach tzak' wip, tzak'an yip woc yic syal in b'ey icha nok' k'ultaquil chej, tzin ik'ank'e b'aj chaanh, b'aj ol in colchajoc. B'itajocab' jun b'it tik yuj winh scuchb'an heb' sb'itan yet' juntzanh yamk'ab' ayoch sch'anhal.
